long_description: Relax or sleep anytime, anywhere with the featherweight, molded-foam Bucky 40 Blinks Eye Mask. Contoured for pressure-free, smudge-free eye comfort, it blocks out light to help you fall asleep. Latex-free foam conforms gently to your face and around your eyes; lightweight, molded cups allow you to blink freely. Adjustable strap fits most head sizes; machine washable.
short_description: Relax or sleep anytime, anywhere with the featherweight, molded-foam Bucky 40 Blinks Eye Mask. Contoured for pressure-free, smudge-free eye comfort, it blocks out light to help you fall asleep.
